newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czehc FinMin sets 46-day T-bill auction Thursday.
newsitem.headline: Czehc FinMin sets 46-day T-bill auction Thursday.

text.p: The Czech Finance Ministry on Wednesday set an auction of a six billion crown tranche of 46-day treasury bills, the Czech National Bank (CNB) said on Wednesday.

The CNB said in a statement the minimum price in the auction was set at 977,639 crowns for a nominally valued one million crown bill, implying a gross yield of 17.9 percent and a net yield of 13.425 percent.
It is the first time this year the Finance Ministry has held an auction of paper with this maturity.
Two month funds on the Prague Interbank Offered Rate (PRIBOR) averaged 18.84 percent on Wednesday.
